data.message: Yo em I doubt you read this shit but fuck everyone talking about how odd you were in some of your interviews I'm a recovering pill addict with a kid and the only person I talk to in person is my daughter because when in recovery you end up with these feelings of anti socialism that no one knows about except the people going through it so I can't imagine how hard it is for you being a public figure so keep your chin up you'll get through it and by the way YOUR THE FUCKING MAN  best album ever brutha
